titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10-year extension of the credit for producing electricity from wind.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 10-year extension of the credit for producing electricity from wind.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a ten-year extension of the credit for electricity produced from a qualified wind facility.
